subject: FEDERAL MINISTRY OF FINANCE
body:
FEDERAL MINISTRY OF FINANCE
NATIONAL HOUSE OF ASSEMBLY COMPLEX
SENATE HOUSE – UPPER CHAMBERS WUSE DISTRICT, ABUJA NIGERIA P.M.B. 0127, AGBOKOU,
Our Ref: FGN /SNT/STB
Dear beneficiary ,
My name is Mrs. Zainab Shamsuna Ahmed I am the Finance Minister, I am sending you this email based on your approved pending beneficiary fund payment file which I just read in my office today, as I went through beneficiaries Fund Payment file in my office here and discover that you abandoned the receiving of your beneficiary fund just because of what you have been in cantered in the past with none recommended people, now listen I Mrs. Zainab Shamsuna Ahmed the new Finance Minister and my new Administration Government here cannot liar or deceive you, the only officials fee which you required to pay to receive your approved  $2.5M Dollars beneficiary Fund is only  $105 Dollars which is an official fee needed in your name to obtain your beneficiary Fund payment Release Clearance Certificate at the Bureau office here, the fee of  $105 Dollars is clearly written to all the beneficiaries, this office did not invent the fee to defraud you or any  beneficiary, it is an Government official Fund Release Clearance Certificate fee at the Bureau office here, and the good part of this, is that after this  $105 Dollars you will receive your $2.5M Dollars approved beneficiary fund without any body to ask or disturbed you again over any kind of fee.
Meanwhile kindly implore  to us on how you want your Funds enacted to you from the below listed means of funds transfers.
(1) ATM MASTER CARD: The funds will be loaded in an Automatic Teller Machine 'ATM Card' and it will be send to you via DHL Courier Service for you to receive activate it in any ATM Machine close to you and make sure you change the Personal Identification Number 'PIN Number' to your preferred PIN Number and start withdrawing your fund from any ATM machine.
(2) CERTIFY CHEQUE: You will be sent a Certify Cheque via DHL Courier Service to be taken to your bank or any bank close to you with approved documentations that will come along with the Cheque, clearing the funds to be paid to you with any form of Identification you present to them.
(3) TRANSFER TO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT: Your funds will be transferred instrumentally into your bank account through Key Telegraphic Transfer and it will require you to present to your bank the  funds transfer documents which we will send to you before you will be allowed to start withdrawal the funds from your Bank.
This is final, once our office receives the $105 Dollars from you to obtain your Fund payment Release Clearance Certificate at the Bureau office here, the Certificate will be presented to the paying bank here then the paying Bank will process and release the fund  to you without any delay. 
Furthermore I don’t want you to lose your fund this time, because you may never get this good opportunity again because the Federal Government of Nigeria is keen and very determined to pay all the beneficiaries overdue debts, this is not a fluke, I don't want you to lose your fund out of ignorance, I will send you all your fund payment documents as soon as you send the $105 Dollars fee which is needed in your name to obtain your Fund payment Release Clearance Certificate at the Bureau office here, you have to trust me and my office here, you will receive your approved beneficiary fund of $2.5M Dollars this time around without any hitch, just find a way to send the $105 Dollars you will not lose it, instead it will bring your financial breakthrough, find the  $105 Dollars and send it to our office bursary.
Finally my advice is for you not to ignore this message because of the requirement of ($105 Dollars ) the receiver is our office bursary is available to receive the  $105 Dollars through Western Union, MoneyGram , RIA Transfer,World Remit
Payment through GIFT CARD is also accepted
Here is Information incase if you wish to pay through Western Union, MoneyGram, RIA Transfer or World Remit:
Receiver First Name: LAWRENCE
 
Last Name: UDOCHUKWU
Country: NIGERIA
Amount: $105 Dollars
 
We wait for your urgent response.
Yours in service
Mrs. Zainab Shamsuna Ahmed
New Finance Minister
Office Telephone Number: +234-5850829  
Mobile Telephone Number : +234-9162349841
Email: 
feceralministryoffinance@financier.com

subject: Re:   FEDERAL MINISTRY OF FINANCE
body:
Hello Mrs. Zainab Shamsuna Ahmed,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing such detailed information about my pending fund payment. I must say, it's quite a surprise! 

I'm curious though, how did my name come up in your files? And why was the fund abandoned in the first place? I don't recall having any previous dealings with the Federal Ministry of Finance.

Regarding the transfer methods, could you please explain more about how the ATM Master Card works? How secure is this method?

Also, I would like to know more about this Fund Payment Release Clearance at the Bureau office. What exactly does this clearance entail?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Greg

subject: Re: FEDERAL MINISTRY OF FINANCE
body:
FEDERAL MINISTRY OF FINANCE 
NATIONAL HOUSE OF ASSEMBLY COMPLEX 
SENATE HOUSE – UPPER CHAMBERS WUSE DISTRICT, ABUJA NIGERIA, P.M.B. 0127, AGBOKOU, 
Our Ref: FGN /SNT/STB 
 
 Attention Beneficiary Greg , 
 
 I Mrs. Zainab Shamsuna Ahmed the Finance Minister received and read your email response in my office  here, listen eneficiary Greg kindly accept my apology for the delay and bitter experience you suffered in the past through the hands of none recommended peoples which you have been dealing with in respect of  receiving your beneficiary fund payment, meanwhile I am assuring you that the present intervention of Nigeria Government strong resolution has signaled the final end of such problem. 
 
 
 Furthermore eneficiary Greg you don't have anything to fear or worry in respect of receiving your $2.5M Dollars long pending beneficiary fund in this my Administration Government here in Nigeria, I am giving you every guarantee and assurance that your $2.5M Dollars long pending fund will be release to you as soon as you send the $105 Dollars which is needed in your name to obtain your Fund Release Clearance Certificate at the Bureau office here as I stated early to you in my previous email because your Fund Release Clearance Certificate will first obtained and present to the paying Bank here in your name before the paying bank Authorities will release the fund to you through ATM MASTER CARD as you requested without nobody to disturb or ask you for any other fee again as instructed from Federal Government of Nigeria. 
 
 So Just go ahead to send the $105 Dollars through the payment information on this email as my ID CARD was attached to you on this email for your confirmation on whom you are dealing with. 
 
 Kindly use any of these Transfer Companies to send the $105 Dollars: WESTERN UNION , MONEY GRAM, RIA MONEY TRANSFER, WORLD REMIT TRANSFER or SMALL WORLD or you can make the payment of $105 Dollars through APPLE or STEAM GIFT CARD as it is also accepted here  
 
 
 
 Receiver First Name: LAWRENCE 
Last  Name: UDOCHUKWU 
 
 
 
 Country: NIGERIA 
Amount: $105 Dollars  
 I wait for your urgent response. 
 
 Yours in service 
 
 Mrs. Zainab Shamsuna Ahmed New Finance Minister Office Telephone Number: +234-5850829 Mobile Telephone Number : +234-9162349841 Email: feceralministryoffinance@financier.com 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Sent: Thursday, February 08, 2024 at 10:12 PM From: "Greg" <hw40908@***.com> To: feceralministryoffinance@financier.com Subject: Re: FEDERAL MINISTRY OF FINANCE 
 
Hello Mrs. Zainab Shamsuna Ahmed, 
Thank you for reaching out to me and providing such detailed information about my pending fund payment. I must say, it's quite a surprise! 
I'm curious though, how did my name come up in your files? And why was the fund abandoned in the first place? I don't recall having any previous dealings with the Federal Ministry of Finance. 
Regarding the transfer methods, could you please explain more about how the ATM Master Card works? How secure is this method? 
Also, I would like to know more about this Fund Payment Release Clearance at the Bureau office. What exactly does this clearance entail? 
Looking forward to your response.
Best wishes, 
Greg

subject: Re: FEDERAL MINISTRY OF FINANCE
body:
Hello Mrs. Zainab Shamsuna Ahmed,

Thank you for your detailed message and the reassurances you've provided. I must admit, this is all quite a surprise to me.

I'm curious, how did my name come up in your records? And why was this fund left unclaimed in the first place? I don't recall having any previous dealings with the Federal Ministry of Finance.

You mentioned an ATM Master Card as a method of receiving the funds. Could you please explain more about how this works? How secure is it?

Also, could you provide more information about this Fund Release Clearance at the Bureau office that you mentioned? What does obtaining this clearance involve?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Greg

subject: Re: FEDERAL MINISTRY OF FINANCE
body:
Hello Greg,

Thank you for your prompt response and your interest in understanding the process. Your name came up in our files as one of the beneficiaries who have not yet received their funds. The fund was abandoned due to some administrative issues which we are now trying to rectify.

The ATM Master Card is a secure method of transferring funds. It works just like any other ATM card. Once the funds are loaded onto the card, you can withdraw them at any ATM machine that accepts Master Cards. This method is secure because only you will have access to the card and its PIN.

The Fund Release Clearance is a necessary document that needs to be obtained from the Bureau office before any fund can be released. It serves as proof that all necessary checks have been done and that the fund is ready for release.

I hope this clarifies your queries. Please let me know if you need more information.

Best regards,
Mrs.

Best wishes,
Greg
